name: Bubble Hell (volpepj)
description:
Game Controls: ASWD > Movement / Spacebar > Jump

Game Story:

Zac was sent to the deepest hell to become a demon by Pyrus the god of earth, for loving one of his daughters. However Zac heard if he finds the Lava Bubble God he can make a deal with him and escape from hell to meet your beloved once again.

Tile set for the environment > Warped Caves

Animations/Character/Enemies/Level Design > Designed by Volpe

Menu/Audio > Designed by Isaiah

Joao Pedro Volpe / Isaiah Sarkor
